snippet.title: Operation: Polygon Storm | Launch Trailer (Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store)
snippet.description:
OUT NOW! 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2310160/Operation_Polygon_Storm/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/operation_polygon_storm
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/pl/p/operation-polygon-storm-65c37e

Dive into this fast-paced, military tug-of-war game where strategic brilliance meets minimal micromanagement. Assemble your army from a diverse selection of specialized units, each with unique abilities and upgrades. Whether you prefer infantry, armor, artillery, or air support, there’s a perfect combination waiting for you to discover.

Key Features:
- Strategic Depth: Mix and match units to create powerful synergies and adapt your strategy on the fly.
- Minimal Micromanagement: Focus on the big picture as your units advance, attack, and take cover autonomously.
- Highly Destructible Environments: Experience the chaos of war with dynamic environments, ragdoll physics, and a touch of gore.
- No Base Building: Jump straight into the action without the need for resource harvesting or base construction.

See you on the battlefield!
